name: Travis Trails and the Tale of the TreeTeller's Treasure
name_original: Travis Trails and the Tale of the TreeTeller's Treasure
description:
This game was made for my Intro to Game Development class at NYU.

 You are a ranger named Travis Trails. You and your dog, Boomerang, are tasked with returning a stolen gem to the coconut spirits (called TreeTellers) who inhabit this jungle.

This was a particularly fun game to make because it uses characters and creatures who I had first thought of a long time ago. It was really satisfying to be able to take my old ideas, and express them in this interactive fictional world.

As you play, make sure you talk to all the other characters. They will have good advice for you as you make your way throughout the jungle.

Music: Legend by Adrian von Zeigler (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gcUyN66G0IA)

Other sound effects were from www.freesound.org
